        Parameters:
        label - Label to resolve
        asm - Assembly object
        Returns:
        The address of label if the label resolves, if not, the address if it parses as an address, -1 otherwise

      • parseEscapeCharacter

        public static long parseEscapeCharacter(java.lang.String str)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes a string representing a character enclosed by single quotes and checks for escaped characters. If escaped character is detected, the function will return the actual character code. It will only strip the single quotes otherwise. For example, 'A' will be returned as A as long, and '\n' will be returned as the newline character.
        Parameters:
        str - The string representing the character
        Returns:
        Character code in long
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findFileInDirectory

        public static java.lang.String findFileInDirectory(java.lang.String dirStr,
                                                   java.lang.String fileStr,
                                                   boolean recurse,
                                                   ThreadSync t)
        Find a file in the specified directory
        Parameters:
        dirStr - Directory to search
        fileStr - File name to be searched
        recurse - Recurse into subdirectories
        t - Thread synchronization object. Useful for canceling the search before it is completed via a thread and to display the current path being searched
        Returns:
        Absolute path of the file if found, null otherwise

        public static boolean deleteFile(java.lang.String path)

      • deleteRecursive

        public static boolean deleteRecursive(java.io.File path)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        By default File#delete fails for non-empty directories, it works like "rm". We need something a little more brutual - this does the equivalent of "rm -r" http://stackoverflow.com/a/4026761 Paulitex
        Parameters:
        path - Root File Path
        Returns:
        true iff the file and all sub files/directories have been removed
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • resolveBaseOffset

        public static long resolveBaseOffset(PLPAsm asm,
                                     java.lang.String location)
        Return the effective address of addresses in (base+offset) or (base-offset) format
        Parameters:
        location - base+offset address in String
        Returns:
        resolved address in long, -1 if the address is failed to be resolved
